quotes.quote: Never make someone a priority when all you are to them is an option.
You don't have to rebuild a relationship with everyone you have forgiven.
Nothing can be changed until it is faced.
No matter how bad you want a person, if your hearts are in two different places, you’ll have to pass and move on.
The Sun will rise and set regardless. What we choose to do with the light while it's here is up to us. Journey wisely.
I am unfolding slowly because blooming takes time.
Someone once told me love isn’t perfect—or predictable.
Sometimes you climb out of bed in the morning and you think, I'm not going to make it, but you laugh inside — remembering all the times you've felt that way
If you can't beat the fear, just do it scared.
Your new life is going to cost you your old one.
There is a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
We must bring our own light into the darkness.
You will be too much for osme people. Those aren't your people.
You'll never have to negotiate your way into a heart that wants you there.
You are not too old. And it is not too late.
Watering a dead plant doesn't bring it back to life.
There is nothing holding you back in life more than yourself.
New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.

Another person's beauty is not the absence of your own. Another person's success is not the absence of your own. Another person's progress is not the absence of your own. Another person's happiness is not the absense of your own.
The things we lose are not losses. They are entry ways. They are the world saying, sometimes sharply, there is something else out there.
You are allowed to outgrow people.
Stop feeling bad for outgrowing people who had the chance to grow with you.
Don't let someone live rent-free in your head.
If their absense brings you peace, you didn't really lose them.
Do yourself a favor and take mixed signals as a 'no'.
Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
Freedom is not something that anybody can be given. Freedom is something people take, and people are as free as they want to be.
No force on earth can stop an idea whose time has come.
Stay away from people who make you think you're hard to love.
You can't heal in the same environment that made you sick.
Learning never exhausts the mind.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
The best revenge is massive success.
The distance between insanity and genius is measured only by success.
People ask, 'What's the best role you've ever played?' The next one.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
Some girls are full of heartache and poetry and those are the kind of girls who try to save wolves instead of running away from them.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
